page.title: 08AGRICULTURE
page.content:
Small mixed farms in area.Mainly permanent pasture with some wheat and oilseed.Crown Hill fattened cattle. Woodredon Farm is now a riding school.
RAVENERS FARM. MR & MRS WARD who live at Raveners farm are now retired.They've lived at the farm 22 years.It has over 15 rooms. 400 years ago servants worked there,a box which called them remains.The farm closed down when the owners retired, though the large barns are rented out. Poultry and cattle were kept there,but DUSTY the dog is the only remaining animal there now.She was found in a dustcart.Mrs Ward exercises Dusty every day in the forest.Although the noisy motorway is nearby,Mr & Mrs Ward say they wouldn't wish to live anywhere else because they love it there.
